answer: Your credential gets issued with the personal details you provided while signing up 🤓. You can edit your personal profile under “Account Preferences” ⚙️.
answer_formatted: Your credential gets issued with the personal details you provided while signing up 🤓. You can edit your personal profile under “Account Preferences” ⚙️.
